When a party member gets on a mount that supports more than 1 person and is close enough, you will automatically get on.

This plugin is in testing and will have one or more issues, laid out below:

- You may need to right click on the driver once each time you start the game before the plugin will automount their mount. A fix is being investigated.

Please report issues/bugs and post suggestions on the Github website by clicking the globe icon.

plugins.Author: Aida Enna
plugins.Name: Macro Chain Redux
plugins.Description:
Allows for a macro to continue onto the next macro by using '/nextmacro' on the last line of a macro.
Adding '/nextmacro' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #02
Adding '/nextmacro down' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #11
Also allows executing any macro from chat using '/runmacro'
You can repeat a macro by using /runmacro inside the macro followed by the number of the macro you're editing
Using '/macrocancel' will stop the currently running macro

plugins.Author: Aida Enna
plugins.Name: Portrait Fixer

This plugin is in testing and will have one or more issues, laid out below:

- Rarely, a glitched desynth window will pop up when saving the gearset instead of it saving the portait. This is being investigated, closing the window and swapping classes seems to fix it.

Please report issues/bugs and post suggestions on the Github website by clicking the globe icon.

plugins.Description:

plugins.Author: The Combat Reborn Team
plugins.Name: Rotation Solver Reborn
plugins.Description:
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.
Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.

plugins.Author: Kid Icarus
plugins.Name: Character Select+
plugins.Description:
Character Select+ allows you to create, save, and instantly apply fully customized character profiles with the press of a button. Switch between your OCs effortlessly using /select CharacterName, applying Penumbra Collections, Glamourer Designs, Customize+ Profiles, and Honorific Titles in one command.

While profile switching is its core purpose, Character Select+ includes additional features:
✔ Advanced Mode – Create custom macro setups for deeper character customization.
✔ Profile-Specific Designs – Use multiple outfits, styles, and looks per character.
✔ Favorites & Sorting – Keep profiles organized by name, date, or importance.
✔ Quick Swap Bar! 
✔ One-Click Macro Execution – Run predefined commands instantly when selecting a character.

Whether you're roleplaying, gposing, or just love quick customization, Character Select+ makes switching between characters faster, easier, and seamless.

"/ffcd" to open the settings.

"/ffcd <length> <interval1> <interval2> ..." to begin the fun fact countdown.

For example, "/ffcd 15 10 5 0" will start a 15 second countdown and share a fun fact to your chosen chat channel (Party by default) at the 10 second, 5 second, and 0 second marks!

***If no intervals are given, your party will enjoy a fun fact for every second of the countdown.

plugins.Author: Anna
plugins.Name: Heliosphere
plugins.Description:
Heliosphere is a mod manager and platform designed to work directly with
Penumbra. It enables efficient downloads and fast installs to let you get back
to the fun part of mods: using them.

Heliosphere supports:
- Direct install to Penumbra
- Compressed and deduplicated (read: small) downloads
- Automatic updates (optional)
- Version history
- Mod changelogs
- Pictures in Penumbra
- And more

Give Heliosphere a try, and see if you can't say goodbye to any old mod
platform you were using before.

While this is it's primary purpose, it has quite an exhaustive list of other features including:
	- Craft planning
	- Market board integration

	- Item window that includes vendor and source information among other things

plugins.Author: Aida Enna
plugins.Name: Macro Chain Redux
plugins.Description:
Allows for a macro to continue onto the next macro by using '/nextmacro' on the last line of a macro.
Adding '/nextmacro' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #02
Adding '/nextmacro down' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #11
Also allows executing any macro from chat using '/runmacro'
You can repeat a macro by using /runmacro inside the macro followed by the number of the macro you're editing
Using '/macrocancel' will stop the currently running macro

plugins.Name: Questionable
plugins.Description:
A tiny little quest helper plugin, which does quests for you automatically where possible. Uses navmesh to automatically walk to all quest waypoints, and tries to automatically complete all steps along the way (excluding dungeons, single player duties and combat).

Not all quests are supported, check the discord or git repository for an up-to-date list.

Required Plugins: vnavmesh, TextAdvance, Lifestream

No need for a library of different macros, the solvers will work dynamically to try and complete your crafts. Also provides convenient ways to craft lists of items or grind out a specific item repeatedly.

plugins.Author: kawaii, jukka
plugins.Name: Palace Pal
plugins.Description:
Shows possible trap & Accursed Hoard locations in Palace of The Dead, Heaven on High, and Eureka Orthos.

This plugin requires Splatoon in order to render various draws on the screen.

plugins.Author: Taurenkey, NightmareXIV, croizat

Pandora's Box is a collection of major QoL tweaks and adjustments.

plugins.Author: NightmareXIV, Xenosys
plugins.Name: Splatoon
plugins.Description: Splatoon is a powerful accessibility tool. It revolutionizes gameplay with its custom waymark system, offering the ability to create unlimited grouped waymarks, labels, and actor indicators with exacting pixel precision. This feature empowers players by making crucial objects and events more visually discernible, thereby facilitating quicker reactions. However, it's important to note that the plugin does not come pre-loaded with presets. Players have the freedom to craft their own or import existing ones, offering a personalized touch to their gaming experience.

plugins.Author: Team Wrath
plugins.Name: Wrath Combo
plugins.Description: Turns one action into many! Similar to how PvP actions work, we take an action and build a whole combo out of it. Sometimes it's as simple as a 1-2-3 combo, other times it's a full job rotation. Either way, you'll find something suited for your rotation needs.

plugins.Author: daemitus, kawaii
plugins.Name: Yes Already
plugins.Description: Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).

plugins.Author: UnknownX
plugins.Name: Cammy
plugins.Description:
A simple camera editor to change various game defaults such as zoom and fov.
This is a zoom hack, if you aren't comfortable with that fact, don't install it.

plugins.Author: UnknownX
plugins.Name: NoClippy
plugins.Description: Reduces the effects of lag on certain aspects of the game, such as weaving and statuses. Usable as an alternative, or in addition, to XivAlexander.

plugins.Author: UnknownX
plugins.Name: ReAction
plugins.Description: Improves aspects of the battle system with action stacks (like MOAction) and various QoL settings.

plugins.Author: Asriel
plugins.Name: Waitingway (Unofficial)
plugins.Description:
Contributes and utilizes crowdsourced login, duty, and roulette queue information for the benefit of everyone.

Current features include queue time estimates and notifications via Discord, so you can know when you make it into the game, as well as anonymously collecting and reporting statistics about your queue times to crowdsource information about FFXIV server load and activity. Join our Discord for more information!

Discord URL: https://waiting.camora.dev/discord
